EmailTemplate.name: Event - Update Special Invite - Netherlands.Email - Confirmation - Netherlands
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of registration: Tosca Update Special 2015 – Utrecht, Netherlands
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We are delighted that you have signed up for the Tosca Update Special 2015 in Utrecht on June 25th, 2015. Below you will find again the agenda and location.
Agenda: 13:00 – 13:30 Registration & Welcome 13:30 – 15:00 New Features & Demo – Part 1 15:00 – 15:30 Coffee Break 15:30 – 16:45 New Features & Demo – Part 2 16:45 – 17:00 Summary and Q&A After: Join us after the presentations for a time to discuss and network!
Location: Update Special – Utrecht June 25th, 2015, 1:00 – 5:00 p.m. Jaarbeurs Supernova – Room Expedition Jaarbeursplein 3521 AL Utrecht
We look forward to seeing you there!
Best Regards, The Tricentis Events Team
